other_tests.findings: Significantly increased blood-flow, blood-pool, and delayed-phase radioactivity over both feet.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up scan showed less radiotracer uptake consistent with a good response to calcitonin therapy.

other_tests.findings: Less diffuse radioactivity over the feet compared to the initial study.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Bone-to-soft tissue ratios improved from 12.6 to 6.6 after calcitonin therapy.

other_tests.findings: No resting potential, giant potentials, or an increase of polyphasic wave in the legs.
Prolonged distal latencies and conduction velocity in both tibial, peroneal, and sural nerves.
